pullrequest.title: Add function to remove filter in ContactManager

content.raw:
I think there's just one more in Link.cc:
~~~
diff -r 2635f5292922 gazebo/physics/Link.cc
--- a/gazebo/physics/Link.cc	Mon Feb 10 14:48:19 2014 -0800
+++ b/gazebo/physics/Link.cc	Mon Feb 10 16:39:55 2014 -0800
@@ -276,6 +276,8 @@
   }
 
 #ifdef HAVE_OPENAL
+  this->world->GetPhysicsEngine()->GetContactManager()->RemoveFilter(
+    this->GetScopedName() + "/audio_collision");
   this->audioSink.reset();
 #endif
 
~~~
